price: Ёки сиз улардан ҳақ сўраяпсиз-у, улар тўлашдан қийналиб қолгандирлар?!
arabic: أَمۡ تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا فَهُم مِّن مَّغۡرَمٖ مُّثۡقَلُونَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: am tasaluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muth'qalūna
